skills.skill: Soil Erosion and Sediment Control Design

duties_responsibilities.duty: Project management, technical proposal and invoice preparation, and monitoring of project budgets
Staff supervision, scheduling of key projects, and responsibility for design tasks associated with civil engineering projects
Land Development Plan, Stormwater Management, Water and Sanitary Sewer Design, and Soil Erosion and Sediment Control Design
Managing multiple projects and workload with competing deadlines
Quality Control, Regulatory agency permitting, and proposal scope and budget preparation
Financial Management including invoice preparation and accounts receivable
Project Scheduling, Client management, and mentoring and training staff

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering. Professional Engineer (PE) Certification preferred.
